message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not comfortable going as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. This is a great compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it's a fair deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're still a bit higher than $10000, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer it to you for $10500. This is as low as I can go, and I'm confident it's a fair price for this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit higher than $10500. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can you meet me at that price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $10200. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I understand you're making one final offer, but I'm still a bit higher than $10200. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9800. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $10200, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10200 and $9800. I'll offer it to you for $9900. This is my final and best offer.
